Namespace KdSoft.Lmdb

Classes

Cursor

Cursor for LMDB database.

Database

LMDB Database that allows unique (by key) records only.

DatabaseConfiguration

Database configuration

DatabaseTransaction

LMDB Transaction that allows creating or opening databases. Only one of these can be active in the environment at a time.

Environment

LMDB environment.

EnvironmentConfiguration

Basic environment configuration

ErrorUtil

Helpers for native error handling.

FixedMultiValueCursor

Cursor for fixed-size multi-value database.

FixedMultiValueDatabase

FixedMultiValueDatabaseConfiguration

FixedMultiValueDatabase configuration

LmdbException

Exception class representing errors returned from MLDB API calls, or inappropriate use of the .NET bindings.

MultiValueCursor

Cursor for multi-value database.

MultiValueDatabase

MultiValueDatabaseConfiguration

MultiValueDatabase configuration

ReadOnlyTransaction

Transaction

LMDB Transaction.

Structs

Cursor.ItemsEnumerator

Implements Enumerator pattern for use with foreach loops when the items to be iterated over can only live on the stack. This works because the foreach loop does not require an explicit implementaion of the IEnumerator interface.

Cursor.ItemsIterator

Implements the Enumerable pattern for use with foreach loops when the items to be iterated over can only live on the stack. This works because the foreach loop does not require an explicit implementaion of the IEnumerable interface.

Cursor.NextItemsEnumerator

Implements Enumerator pattern for use with foreach loops when the items to be iterated over can only live on the stack. This works because the foreach loop does not require an explicit implementation of the IEnumerator interface.

Cursor.NextItemsIterator

Implements the Enumerable pattern for use with foreach loops when the items to be iterated over can only live on the stack. This works because the foreach loop does not require an explicit implementaion of the IEnumerable interface.

EnvironmentInfo

Statistics for a database in the environment

KeyDataPair

Represents a database entry/record as a stack-only data structure (ref struct).

MultiValueCursor.ValuesEnumerator

Enumerator class that iterates over all values in a key. See MultiValueCursor.ValuesIterator. Equivalent to, but not an implementation of, IEnumerator. Will be be used in foreach statements as if it was an implementation of IEnumerator.

MultiValueCursor.ValuesIterator

Iterator class that iterates over all values in a key. Equivalent to, but not an implementation of, IEnumerable. Can be used in foreach statements as if it was an implementation of IEnumerable.

MultiValueCursor.ValuesNextEnumerator

Enumerator class that iterates over the values forward from the current duplicate position. See MultiValueCursor.ValuesNextIterator. Equivalent to, but not an implementation of, IEnumerator. Will be be used in foreach statements as if it was an implementation of IEnumerator.

MultiValueCursor.ValuesNextIterator

Iterator class that iterates over the values forward from the current duplicate position. Equivalent to, but not an implementation of, IEnumerable. Can be used in foreach statements as if it was an implementation of IEnumerable.

Statistics

Statistics for a database or the environment.
